title: panic! occurs after OS starts

labels.name: C-bug
labels.description: Category: bug. Something is wrong. This is bad!

labels.name: B-upstream
labels.description: Blocked: needs a change in a dependency or the compiler.

body:
The problem that occurs with the master branch.
If you run the communication within 1.5 minutes after the OS starts, a panic! will occur. Windows/iOS has a problem.

stack trace.

```
thread '<unnamed>' panicked at 'overflow when subtracting duration from time', src\libcore\option.rs:794
```
